languages.text: "Немыслимое преступление — повредить святую реликвию, и страшное богохульство — пытаться силою обойти испытание мудрости и веры, заключенное здесь".
"To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."
languages.original_text: "Немыслимое преступление — повредить святую реликвию, и страшное богохульство — пытаться силою обойти испытание мудрости и веры, заключенное здесь".

traits.locale_text: "To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."
"To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."
"To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."
"To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."
"To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."
"To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."

languages.text: « Il est inconcevable d'endommager une relique sacrée, et nous commettrions un terrible sacrilège en employant la force pour contourner l'épreuve de sagesse et de foi à laquelle elle nous soumet. »
languages.original_text: "To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."

traits.locale_text: « Il est inconcevable d'endommager une relique sacrée, et nous commettrions un terrible sacrilège en employant la force pour contourner l'épreuve de sagesse et de foi à laquelle elle nous soumet. »

languages.text: «Dañar una reliquia sagrada es un crimen inconcebible, y valerse de la fuerza bruta para evitar la prueba de sabiduría y fe que plantea equivale a cometer una terrible blasfemia».
languages.original_text: "To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."

traits.locale_text: «Dañar una reliquia sagrada es un crimen inconcebible, y valerse de la fuerza bruta para evitar la prueba de sabiduría y fe que plantea equivale a cometer una terrible blasfemia».

languages.text: “破坏神圣的遗物是难以想象的恶劣罪行。若是用暴力强行通过智慧与信仰的考验，那将会是可怕的亵渎之举。”
languages.original_text: "To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."

traits.locale_text: “破坏神圣的遗物是难以想象的恶劣罪行。若是用暴力强行通过智慧与信仰的考验，那将会是可怕的亵渎之举。”

languages.text: 「神聖な遺物を損傷することは考えられない犯罪であり、そこに含まれる知恵と信仰の試練を迂回するために武力を行使することは、恐ろしい冒涜です」
languages.original_text: "To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."

traits.locale_text: 「神聖な遺物を損傷することは考えられない犯罪であり、そこに含まれる知恵と信仰の試練を迂回するために武力を行使することは、恐ろしい冒涜です」

languages.text: "Ein heiliges Relikt zu beschädigen, ist ein unaussprechliches Verbrechen, und die darin ruhende Prüfung der Weisheit und des Glaubens mit Gewalt zu umgehen, ist schreckliche Blasphemie."
languages.original_text: "To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."

traits.locale_text: "Ein heiliges Relikt zu beschädigen, ist ein unaussprechliches Verbrechen, und die darin ruhende Prüfung der Weisheit und des Glaubens mit Gewalt zu umgehen, ist schreckliche Blasphemie."

languages.text: "Kutsal bir yadigâra hasar vermek, akla hayale sığmayacak bir suçtur ve barındırdığı irfan ve inanç sınavını güç kullanarak aşmak, dine karşı korkunç bir hakarettir."
languages.original_text: "To damage a sacred relic is an unthinkable crime, and to use force to bypass the test of wisdom and faith it contains is terrible blasphemy."
